emotional_functions.name: Unsympathetic Character
emotional_functions.description: Hard to like but may still compel or challenge the protagonist.

emotional_functions.name: Catalyst
emotional_functions.description: Pushes others to change without changing much themselves.

emotional_functions.name: Observer
emotional_functions.description: Exists at the margins, often revealing truths unnoticed.

emotional_functions.name: Instigator
emotional_functions.description: Creates disruptions that force growth or conflict.

emotional_functions.name: Victim
emotional_functions.description: Suffers due to external forces, evoking sorrow or motivation.

emotional_functions.name: Aggressor
emotional_functions.description: Causes harm, either directly or through manipulation.
